lines.gurmukhi: suin ipRX gvn sRvn bhry n Bey; kwhy kI piqbRqw piqbRq pwXo hY [

Unknown.translation: Why did my ears not turn deaf hearing the departure of my dear beloved? What type of faithful and loyal wife am I and what sort of husband-engrossed religion (life style) have I acquired?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ipAwry dw jwxw sux ky myry kMn boly nw ho gey qwˆ mYˆ kwhdI piqbRqw hoeI qy mYˆ kI pRiqbRq pRwpq kIqw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: idRst ipRX Agocr huie AMDry n Bey nYn; kwhy kI pRymnI pRym hUM ljwXo hY [

Unknown.translation: Why did I not go blind when my beloved was disappearing from my vision? What sort of beloved am I ? I have shamed the love.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: nzroˆ auhly ipAwry dy hoieAwˆ ieh nyqr AMnHy nw hoey qwˆ mYˆ kwhdI pRyimkw hoeI? ieh qwˆ pRym nUM hI mYˆ lwj lweI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: AviD ibhwey Dwie Dwie ibrhw ibAwpY; kwhy kI ibrhnI ibrh iblKwXo hY [

Unknown.translation: My life is waning and the separation of my Lord is chasing me and causing me distress. What type of separation is this? The pangs of separations have made me restless.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: aumr bIq rhI hY; ibrhw dOV dOV ky ies nUM ivAwp irhw hY qwˆ mYˆ kwhdI ibrhnI hoeI ieh qwˆ ibrh nUM hI mYˆ audws kIqw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: sunq ibdys ky sMdys nwih PUtXo irdw; kaun kaun gnau cUk auqr n AwXo hY [667[

Unknown.translation: Why has my heart not burst, receiving the message that my dear beloved will stay away from me in other place? What all blunders made may I count and recall, I have no answer of it.  (667)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ibdySwˆ dy sunyhy suxidAwˆ myrw ihrdw ikauˆ nw PitAw? ikhVI ikhVI mYˆ AwpxI Bu`l igxwˆ; ies dw mYnUM au`qr nhIˆ Awauˆdw ]667]
